DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study see twelve-week exercise intervention overweight obese subject pre-diabetes early disease course type 2 diabetes lead improve skeletal muscle capillary blood flow improve substance dilate blood vessel result improve insulin sensitivity .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Males female age 3060 year age 2 . Overweight Obese ( 28 < BMI < 45 ) 3 . Confirmed prediabetic ( 5.7≤ HbA1c < 6.5 ) 4 . Type 2 DM , Diagnosis 2 year less , medication metformin , HbA1c ≤ 6.7 1 . Stage 3 chronic kidney disease ( glomerular filtration rate [ GFR ] < 60 ) 2 . Obstructive Coronary artery disease 3 . Congestive heart failure ( ejection fraction < 55 % ) 4 . Peripheral vascular disease , 5 . Degenerative joint disease , musculoskeletal disease , peripheral vascular disease limit ability exercise 6 . Know hypersensitivity Definity® ultrasound contrast agent 7 . Intracardiac pulmonary shunt 8 . The use antithrombotic agent severe bleed diathesis due risk bleed intravenous arterial line placement 9 . Physical activity great three hour per week 10 . Pregnancy
